text:
Tomcat3.2.1 does not check the existence of the orijinal jsp file.
It simple picks it up from the compiled classes in the work directory.
This happens even with reloadable = true.
So a user will continue to get the jsp file displayed on his browser 
inspite of the fact that the file has been deleted from the server directories.
creator: sabyasachi_gupta@phoenix.com
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: This has already been fixed in 3.2.2, 3.3 and 4.0.
